name: ProcJam
description:
What do tanks do? Collect flags and shoot stuff, of course (...yeah ...of course)! They are quite hard to maneuver though....

Anyways...!

This is a little local multiplayer game I made for my first Procedural Generation Jam (ProcJam2016). It still has no title and no background music, but I'll update this as soon as I can.

Helpful tip: If you get stuck, try moving backwards and turn to adjust your position :)
